location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch Map of Part of S-W Persia showing routes by Captains Burton and Vaughan, 1897'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper with some red inkDimensions: 685 x 582mm, on sheet 810 x 657mm

mods.abstract: Map of Western Persia showing the routes detailed in Appendix to Routes in Persia. Section II,of which it is a part. The routes are marked in red ink. The map depicts topography, hydrology, settlements, and telegraph offices.The map is given the number 1,495-I, 98 and includes the printing statement 'Intelligence Branch. Topo. Dy. No. 2.380. Exd. C. J. A. September 1898.'
